scripts.gen-types:typescript: npx supabase gen types --lang=typescript --project-id xabgyfpbpksntpjdfcre > webapp/src/lib/supabase/database.types.ts && echo 'âœ… Generated database.types.ts - helper types in types.ts are preserved'
scripts.search-symbol:local: cd webapp && node scripts/search-and-add-symbol.js http://localhost:3000 search
scripts.search-symbol:prod: cd webapp && node scripts/search-and-add-symbol.js https://trackfolio-jy6d.vercel.app search
scripts.add-symbol:local: cd webapp && node scripts/search-and-add-symbol.js http://localhost:3000 add
scripts.add-symbol:prod: cd webapp && node scripts/search-and-add-symbol.js https://trackfolio-jy6d.vercel.app add
scripts.clean: cd webapp && rm -rf .next node_modules && npm install
